Name: Rescue bomber
About the game: Rescue bomber Experience upgraded version of bomberman with more game modes and with very challenging levels! Play chillout VS MODE with computer or with your friends or try to complete intense story mode. Story The evil Lord of Skull kidnapped all your fellows from the village and you have to rescue them my friend. Use bombs to fight the freedom for one you love. You are the hope, you are the Rescue Bomber! Features 4 game modes with bosses included 60 levels to beat in story mode Story mode local cooperation with another player Simple character upgrade system Local VS mode up to 4 people with computer or other players Challenging difficulty, specifically on higher levels Character painting system 29 in game achievements
